sql.trim: a.store_id AS "storeId", a.head_pic AS "headPic", a.logo AS "logo", a.banner AS "banner", a.name AS "name", a.product_count AS "productCount", a.is_open AS "isOpen", a.settlement_period AS "settlementPeriod", a.country_id AS "countryId", a.country_name AS "countryName", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.city_name AS "cityName", a.district_id AS "districtId", a.district_name AS "districtName", a.detailed_address AS "detailedAddress", a.store_tel AS "storeTel", a.store_qq AS "storeQq", a.store_wechat AS "storeWechat", a.seo_title AS "seoTitle", a.seo_keyword AS "seoKeyword", a.seo_describe AS "seoDescribe", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.industry AS "industry", a.store_type AS "storeType", a.level_id AS "levelId", a.industry_id AS "industryId", a.commission AS "commission", a.marking_img_path AS "markingImgPath", a.all_sales AS "allSales", a.all_sales_date AS "allSalesDate", a.week_sales AS "weekSales", a.week_sales_date AS "weekSalesDate", a.month_sales AS "monthSales", a.month_sales_date AS "monthSalesDate", a.month3_sales AS "month3Sales", a.month3_sales_date AS "month3SalesDate", a.product_score AS "productScore", a.logistics_score AS "logisticsScore", a.service_attitude_score AS "serviceAttitudeScore", a.count_collection AS "countCollection", a.product_score_up_or_down AS "productScoreUpOrDown", a.logistics_score_up_or_down AS "logisticsScoreUpOrDown", a.service_attitude_score_up_or_down AS "serviceAttitudeScoreUpOrDown",
